general.name: Karan Burnwal
general.headline: ML | DL | Python Dev.
about: I work with Python, focusing on machine learning, using PyTorch, and integrating large language models (LLMs) with APIs. Problem-solving and building effective solutions are at the core of what I do
Beyond the screen, you'll often find me on the badminton court, channeling my competitive spirit and love for the game
Whether it's fine-tuning a model, debugging code, or perfecting my smash, I'm always up for a challenge!

projects.name: ANOTAR
projects.description: Leverage the power of LLMs to convert PDFs/Images to Markdown Notes

projects.name: SP2 BI-{GRU-LSTM}
projects.description: A Hybrid Bi{GRU-LSTM} Neural Network for multivariate time-series prediction

projects.name: QnA Document Tool
projects.description: A tool for extracting question-and-answer pairs from documents using NLP techniques. Course project for COL106

education.subject: Electrical Engineering
description: Hands-on experiment with analog circuits, motor-drives, transmission lines and more...
Excelled in acads and coding competitions.
